main.subtitle: Grandfather clock repairing
main.text: Professional grandfather clock repairing with home visit

item1.title: Any difficulty
item1.text: We repair grandfather clocks of any complexity, the master will repair and debug both modern and antique clock models, restore the movement of cuckoos, quartz, mechanical clocks with a regular or quarter strike.

item2.title: Home visit
item2.text: Need to fix an old grandfather clock with a large, bulky case? The watchmaker will come to your house to deal with the breakdown!

item3.title: Quality
item3.text: The specialists of the center annually attend advanced trainings and use only the latest watch repair equipment. Therefore, our customers can be sure that their watches are in good hands.

item1.title: 1. Order service
item1.text: Place an order with a choice of date, time, city and contact details.

item2.title: 2. Payment
item2.text: Payment for the order online or in cash to the master.

item3.title: 3. Repairing
item3.text: Fulfillment by the master of your order at the specified time.
